# Draft:Global Music Awards

----
| notable_awardees =
* Joice Espinoza – Pangako Mo (Silver Medal Winner, 2024)
* John Rey Malto – Pangako Mo (Silver Medal Winner, 2024)
}}
The Global Music Awards is an international music competition that recognizes independent musicians, composers, and songwriters for their contributions to the music industry. Founded in 2011, the awards highlight excellence in a wide range of musical categories, including original scores, soundtracks, vocal performance, and instrumental compositions.
The competition is open to musicians worldwide and is considered a platform for emerging and established artists to gain international recognition. Award levels include Gold Medal Winner, Silver Medal Winner, and Bronze Medal Winner, depending on the jury’s evaluation.
Notable recipients
* Joice Espinoza – Pangako Mo (Silver Medal Winner, 2024)
See also
* Grammy Awards
* International Songwriting Competition
* Hollywood Music in Media Awards
